message: Let's be fair, 60% for me, 40% for you
I understand you want a larger share, but consider the impact of inflation on my end. This offer is fair considering the circumstances.
Considering the inflation on your end, I'll compromise a bit, but I still think I deserve a larger share.
Alice, this is getting us nowhere. Let's be realistic and split this evenly.  Every round that passes hurts us both.
I understand your concerns, but an even split doesn't account for my stronger bargaining position. This is my revised offer.
Alice, time is running out. I'm sticking with this offer.  It's becoming increasingly detrimental for me to continue.  Let's be reasonable and close this deal.
I see you're feeling the pressure of inflation, but I'm not budging much. This is my revised offer. Take it before things get worse for you.
